biotools.summary: ERODE (Evaluation and reduction of stochastic reaction networks and differential equations) is an all-in-one tool for the numerical solution, stochastic simulation, and minimization of dynamical systems with import/export options for a variety of third-party formats including SBML and Matlab.

bioschemas.name: ERODE
bioschemas.summary: ERODE (Evaluation and reduction of stochastic reaction networks and differential equations) is an all-in-one tool for the numerical solution, stochastic simulation, and minimization of dynamical systems with import/export options for a variety of third-party formats including SBML and Matlab.
